summary: Johnny is a very good fighter and thus sheriff Wilson wants him to fight in one of his illegal fights. So Wilson kidnaps Johnny and drills him to become a fighting machine.
cast: Corey Michael Eubanks|Michael Ironside|Rance Howard|Kari Whitman|Don Swayze|Mickey Jones|Clint Howard|Carl Ciarfalio|Cynthia J. Blessington|Alan Gelfant|Brian Avery|A.J. title: Obligado a matar
